Posts.Content: Mar 11, 2012 10:48PM carolined wrote: I had Cyberknife to liver met in April/May 2010. I had great results because I am currently in remission.
Posts.Title: Cyberknife for liver mets? Rach958 thisisme

Posts.Content: Aug 8, 2009 10:30AM carolined wrote: I am so glad I found this website.  I have to have biopsy done on Tuesday because they are still concerned about two mammograms and an ultrasound that I had.  I don't think I am as worried about the biopsy as I am the results.  Last year they found calcifications in my breast but I didn't have to have a biopsy done.  Once I have the biopsy done, I have to wait 2 days for the results. I would love to hear from someone who has experienced the same thing and some words of encouragement would be greatly appreciated.
Posts.Title: Scared out of my mind! Avea Avea
